channel.title: Need help adding a item drop to a npc i added
channel.description: ok, i no how to add npcs now but now i need help puting item drops to a npc

item.title: Need help adding a item drop to a npc i added
item.dc:creator: @treston323 treston323
item.description:
@treston323 wrote:

ok i see where in npc handler you put the name of the npc but in the item what you posted im wondering how do i put the certain item and where to put the item id and that stuff[br][size=1]Posted on: August 16, 2007, 03:24:40 PM[/size][hr]give me like a example [br][size=1]Posted on: August 16, 2007, 03:27:30 PM[/size][hr]is there a way to eddit monster drop on in itemdrops.cfg, if so can some1 help me

item.title: Need help adding a item drop to a npc i added

@For wrote:

Ok well the first part is an array of numbers and it returns a random number from the array and in the second part it drops the random number selected in the first part where the npc was standing.

item.source: Need help adding a item drop to a npc i added

item.title: Need help adding a item drop to a npc i added
item.dc:creator: @For For ( ; ; )
item.description:
@For wrote:

In item.java item2.java or item3.java add …

[code]public static int NAME[] = {//item id’s};

public static int randomNAME()
{
	return NAME[(int)(Math.random()*NAME.length)];
}[/code]

Then in npchandler.java add

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1625) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomNAME(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }
or item2.randomNAME/ item3.randomNAME depending on which one you used.

Read full topic
